Articles.Content:
Asteroid? A, B, C, D, E. I've noticed that asteroids are much bigger than fuel tank of the same mass.

It would be quite neat to build a floating base on Layethe on Ast.E or few of them.
No they won't float, they just splashed down into the water.
Asteroids don't float but only just, so a few rocket parts attached to them can keep them near the surface as long as you put them to water gently enough.
